question: Which amendment bifurcated the erstwhile combined National Commission for Scheduled Castes and Scheduled Tribes into two separate bodies?
explanation: Eighty-Ninth Amendment Act, 2003 bifurcated the erstwhile combined National Commission for Scheduled Castes and Scheduled Tribes into two separate bodies, i.e., the National Commission for Scheduled Castes (Article 338) and the National Commission for Scheduled Tribes (Article 338-A).
